class_notes:
Prerequisites: QTM 210 and BIOL 241


This seminar will use mathematical models to consider how evolutionary forces like selection, drift, and migration shape populations' genotypic and phenotypic diversity.
course_description: Selected advanced topics in quantitative sciences. Open only to junior and senior majors; others by permission of instructor.
